description: Updates the attributes of an existing email archive.

parameters.name: ArchiveId
parameters.description: The identifier of the archive to update.

parameters.name: Retention
parameters.description: A new retention period for emails in the archive. RetentionPeriod (string) --- The enum value sets the period for retaining emails in an archive.

nested_params.name: RetentionPeriod
nested_params.description: The enum value sets the period for retaining emails in an archive.
